transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello ha ji
Customer: ha ji hi good morning mai ang ji baat kare
Executive: ha ji
Customer: ang ji mai navin baat kar raha tha senior manager India mart se kaise hai sir
Executive: badhiya sir sir mai na abhi pesh karke khana khane wala hu mai thoda late utha hu mai thodi der me baat kar lu aap mere ko na aadhe ghante baad kar lena phone pure aadhe ghante baad
Executive: aadhe ghante thik hai 12:30 baje karte hai sir ek minute 11:30 baje karna abhi to pesh karna hai mai pesh karne ja raha 12:00 baje 12:40 12:40 pe kar lena 12:40 ya 45 pe
Customer: pura free ho jaiye to ek baar isko final karte hai na
Executive: 12:40 me ha 12:40 me aap mere ko reply karna phone karna
Executive: thik hai mai wait kar raha hu sir
Customer: ha
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a call after half an hour.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to call at 12:40 PM.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:
